TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRequiresSessionState

summary.span: 指定目标 HTTP 处理程序需要对会话状态值具有读写访问权。

span.span: Specifies that the target HTTP handler requires read and write access to session-state values.

summary.span: 这是一个标记接口，没有任何方法。

span.span: This is a marker interface and has no methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在自定义 HTTP 处理程序中实现接口,以确定处理程序是否需要对会话状态值具有读写访问权限。Implement the interface in your custom HTTP handler to identify that your handler requires read and write access to session-state values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查当前 HTTP 属性, 以确定它是否需要对会话状态值具有读写访问权限。The following code example examines the current HTTP property to determine whether it requires read and write access to session-state values. [!code-csharp[HttpSessionState#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/snippetscs.aspx#32)] [!code-vb[HttpSessionState#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#32)]
